name: Advance Scout
oracle_text:
First strike
{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Aftershock
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Anoint
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Armored Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahli *en*-Dal, bounty hunter

name: Bayou Dragonfly
oracle_text: Flying; swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text:
"Like a sugar stick with wings!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Blood Frenzy
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only before the combat damage step.
Target attacking or blocking creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"When Torahn bellows, none survive—not even the warrior whose horns he rides."
—Talruum adage

name: Blood Pet
oracle_text: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B}.
flavor_text: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.

name: Broken Fall
oracle_text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text:
"I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Canyon Wildcat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

name: Capsize
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Circle of Protection: Black
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Blue
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Green
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Red
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Shadow
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a creature of your choice with shadow would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: White
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Clergy en-Vec
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text:
"Faith's shield is hammered out by the blows of unbelievers."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Clot Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor_text:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Cloudchaser Eagle
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
When the eagle catches a cloud, it tears it into strips that fall to earth.
—Vec myth of the rains

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
—Volrath

name: Coiled Tinviper
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Crown of Flames
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It is the forge of kings.

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Darkling Stalker
oracle_text:
{B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker.
{B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"In this dark place, yes, I *am* afraid of my own shadow."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

name: Dauthi Horror
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.

name: Dauthi Marauder
oracle_text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor_text:
"The Dauthi came from beneath the Ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Dauthi Slayer
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"They have knives for every soul."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Diabolic Edict
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Greven *il*-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

name: Disturbed Burial
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Dream Cache
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text:
"The sanctity of poverty is an invention of the rich."
—Starke

name: Elite Javelineer
oracle_text: Whenever Elite Javelineer blocks, it deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.
flavor_text:
"Precision is frequently more valuable than force."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Elvish Fury
oracle_text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Endless Scream
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Endless Scream enters the battlefield with X scream counters on it.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each scream counter on Endless Scream.
flavor_text:
"I have made Crovax weep; now I will make him scream. The pain will not end, but will bind him to me."
—Volrath

name: Enfeeblement
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text: Crovax had witnessed Selenia lead the *Predator* to the *Weatherlight*. As the battle raged on deck, he felt his strength melt in the heat of her betrayal.

name: Evincar's Justice
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Fireslinger
oracle_text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Flowstone Giant
oracle_text: {R}: Flowstone Giant gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
When the first of these giants woke from the bedrock, he was still sleepy. He yawned and stretched until his legs grew so thin that they snapped like icicles in the sun.
—Vec lore

name: Frog Tongue
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Frog Tongue enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: "But *why* can't I get one?" sniveled Squee. "All da bugs here got wings."

name: Gaseous Form
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Giant Crab
oracle_text: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

name: Giant Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: "Crovax seems filled only with shadows," thought Orim. "Where does his strength come from?"

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Heart Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have haste.
flavor_text: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.

name: Heartwood Dryad
oracle_text: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.
flavor_text: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

name: Hero's Resolve
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+5.
flavor_text:
"Destiny, chance, fate, fortune—they're all just ways of claiming your successes without claiming your failures."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text:
"So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Kindle
oracle_text: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
flavor_text: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

name: Lightning Blast
oracle_text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

name: Lotus Petal
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

name: Lowland Giant
flavor_text: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

name: Manakin
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Hanna regarded Squee sternly. "Because it's *not* a toy, no matter how much it may look like one," she said, taking the manakin from him.

name: Manta Riders
oracle_text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Water is firmament to the finned."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Marsh Lurker
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Swamp: Marsh Lurker gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: From the mists it rises, into the mists it retreats; through the mists it walks, fearless and unseen.

name: Master Decoy
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Metallic Sliver
flavor_text: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

name: Mogg Conscripts
oracle_text: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
flavor_text:
"Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!"
—Tahngarth, aboard the *Predator*

name: Mogg Fanatic
oracle_text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "I got it! I got it! I—"

name: Mogg Raider
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

name: Mounted Archers
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.

name: Muscle Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor_text: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

name: Natural Spring
oracle_text: Target player gains 8 life.
flavor_text: Mirri listened intently, even as Hanna held the healing water to her lips. Would the sound of the spring drown out the elves' approach?

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the *Predator*.

name: Pincher Beetles
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on *me*?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Pit Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Pit Imp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text: The moans of the Death Pits were underscored by the chattering of imps, for whom the ship was cause for much discussion.

name: Power Sink
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

name: Rats of Rath
oracle_text: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.
flavor_text:
"These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Reality Anchor
oracle_text:
Target creature loses shadow until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"See how *you* like it."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Respite
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
flavor_text: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

name: Rolling Thunder
oracle_text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the *Predator*. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

name: Rootbreaker Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

name: Rootwalla
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

name: Rootwater Hunter
oracle_text: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Bitter water vicious wave
Shadow-cold shallows root-made maze
Home's angry embrace."
—*Rootwater Saga*

name: Sadistic Glee
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"First blood isn't as important as last blood."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Sandstone Warrior
oracle_text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I used to describe something stable as 'rock solid.' So much for *that* expression."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

name: Seeker of Skybreak
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target creature.
flavor_text:
"We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Servant of Volrath
oracle_text: When Servant of Volrath leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
flavor_text:
"Volrath is a harsh master. My reflection is a constant reminder of that."
—Greven *il*-Vec

name: Shadow Rift
oracle_text:
Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Draw a card.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Such fuss over machines, Gerrard. Remember that you are the prize of the Legacy. Throw away your toys!"
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Shimmering Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{U}: Return Shimmering Wings to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The brighter the wings, the deeper the impact crater.

name: Skyshroud Elf
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
{1}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text:
"It is our duty to endure."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Skyshroud Ranger
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"Just as you see the grave and remember the friend, I see this forest and remember Llanowar."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Skyshroud Troll
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Skyshroud Troll.
flavor_text: The elves and merfolk have nothing but bitterness for each other. The trolls, however, find them both rather tasty.

name: Soltari Foot Soldier
oracle_text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor_text:
"Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Soltari Lancer
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Soltari Lancer has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text:
"In times of war the victors rarely save their best for last."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Soltari Trooper
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Dauthi blood is Soltari wine."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Spell Blast
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
flavor_text: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

name: Spike Drone
oracle_text:
Spike Drone enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Drone: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Spinal Graft
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"This one has not screamed enough to show effective implantation. Kill it."
—Volrath

name: Squee's Toy
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: As the horrors closed in on Gerrard, Squee trembled and clutched his toy for comfort. He didn't know where it came from or why it was so warm, but he was glad he'd kept it near.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"The land shall beg for drink and curse the rain that follows."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Stun
oracle_text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I concede it was a cheap shot, but it was the only one I could afford."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Talon Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have first strike.
flavor_text: "Keep them at sword's length!" Gerrard's order fell flat as each sliver's talon suddenly grew longer. "Hold on—break out the polearms!"

name: Thalakos Mistfolk
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{U}: Put Thalakos Mistfolk on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"They are 'between' in every way."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Thalakos Seer
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You see our world when you shut your eyes so tightly that tiny shapes float before them."
—Lyna, to Ertai

name: Thalakos Sentry
oracle_text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor_text:
"Ill luck and poor geography caught the Thalakos between us and the Dauthi."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Gone today, here tomorrow."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Trained Armodon
flavor_text: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

name: Tranquility
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.
flavor_text:
"Peace will come, but whether born of harmony or entropy I cannot say."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Twitch
oracle_text:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Battles are won in nuance.

name: Volrath's Curse
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. That creature's controller may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Return Volrath's Curse to its owner's hand.

name: Wall of Diffusion
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Wall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.
flavor_text:
"The injury was being caught between this world and our own; the insult was to find walls within."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You *must* do the same."

name: Winged Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have flying.
flavor_text:
"Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
